'''John Huston''' ([[5 August]] [[1906]] – [[28 August]] [[1987]]) was an American actor, director and screenwriter who voiced the role of [[Gandalf]] in the [[Rankin/Bass]] animated productions of ''[[The Hobbit (1977 film)|''The Hobbit'' (1977 film)]] and [[The Return of the King (1980 film)|''The Return of the King'' (1980 film)]].
